dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
[private] & [private], P.C.
Attorneys at Law

October 15, 2007

VIA facsimile [private]
Email: [private]@google.com; [private]@google.com & U.S. Mail

Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]

Re: Notice of Infringement; DMCA Takedown Notice Ref: #190641685

Dear Google: 
	This firm represents XCENTRIC VENTURES, LLC ("Xcentric") in connection with the protection of its intellectual property rights.  On August 22, 2007, I sent you a DMCA Notice requesting the removal of hundreds of links of content stolen from Xcentric's website www.RipoffReport.com
	Rather than complying with the DMCA Notice, Google responded on September 6, 2007 stating:
"Per our company policy, we require that you list each infringing URL along with each specific corresponding copyrighted URL.  At this time, we ask that you resend us your complaint with additional information." 
	Please note that regardless of Google company policy, if Google wishes to maintain the safe harbor provided by 17 U.S.C. 512(d) it is required to respond in a timely manner to notices that "substantially comply" with the DMCA.  My prior notice substantially complied with each and every part of the DMCA including 17 include a list of "each specific corresponding copyrighted URL."
	Nevertheless, even though Xcentric is clearly not required by the DMCA to do so, in order to assist Google in complying with the law, I am resubmitting the previous DMCA Notice supported by a table (attached) which lists every copyrighted URL alongside the list of infringing URLs.
[page 2]
In that regard, the following information is provided pursuant to 17 U.S.C. 512(c)(3)(A):
1. The copyrighted works being infringed include reports posted on www.RipoffReport.com of which Xcentric is the copyright owner.
See attached spreadsheet incorporated herein by reference.
2. The infringing material is located at the following URL's:
See attached spreadsheet incorporated herein by reference.
The infringing material listed above is also contained within cached Google sites based on the following queries: Search query: "ripoff123456" where "123456" is the actual # indicated in the URL listed above.

For example, a query for "ripoff4771" returns virtually all variants of the above URLs which end with the same suffix; e.g.: "/ripoff4771.html". Listing every cached version of each of the above URLs would be unduly time consuming.  However, some examples of infringing sites in Google's cache are:

http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache: foWaqXKjxoJ:www.remove-rip-off-reports.com/ripoff232627.html+ripoff4771&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=4&gl=us

http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache:H9Xe0oz8BzgJ:www.repsavior.com/ripoff238870.html+ripoff4771&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=2&gl=us

http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache:UIHe-L1NUxcJ:www.complaintremover.com/ripoff174997.html+complaintremover+ripoff&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=2&gl=us

http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache:AzxVyroZz-MJ:www.repsavior.com/ripoff243504.html+ripoff239329&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=2&gl=us

http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache:zKDlsV73XuMJ:www.complaintremover.com/ripoff107525.html+ripoff239329&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=4&gl=us

http://72.14.253.104/search?q=cache:s5tT7nK92Z4J:www.reputationshield.com/ripoffl93448.html+ripoff4771&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=9&gl=us

[page 3]
3. A WHOIS search indicates the owner/operator(s) of the infringing sites are:
a. For www.ComplaintRemover.com
[private]
ComplaintRemover.com
[private]@ccomplaintremover.com [sic]
[private] Tilden, TX[private]
b. For www.RepSavior.com
Reputation Managment [sic]
[private]@gmail.com
[private]
Klagenfurt, [private]

c. For www.Remove-NegativeListings.com

Unknown; WHOIS Returns only the following: Domain Name: Remove-Negativelistings.com
Registrar: Godaddy.com, Inc.
Whois Server: whois.godaddy.com
Name Server: NS9.xtrasupply.com
Name Server: NS10.Xtrasupply.com

d. For www.Remove-Rip-Off-Reports.com
Reputation Managment [sic]
[private]@gmail.com
[private]
Klagenfurt, [private]

e. For www.ReputationShield.com
Reputation Managment [sic]
[private]@gmail.com
[private]
Klagenfurt,[private]

[page 4]

4. The copyright to the material listed above is owned by Xcentric and the use of this material by the operator of the above-refereced website(s) is not authorized by Xcentric, its agents, or the law.
5. I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing statements are accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Xcentric the owner of the exclusive right to the copyrighted works.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at [private] or via email [private].  Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Very truly yours, 
[private]& [private], P.C.
/s/
(Electronically Signed)
[private]
cc: Xcentric Ventures, L.L.C. (via email)
Chilling Effects: (via email:[private])
